title: Columbo - Seasons 3 and 4
description:
Description
Columbo - Seasons 3 and 4

image
Season 3, Episode 1
September 23, 1973
Lovely but Lethal
A cosmetic manufacturer murders an employee who stole the formula for a beauty cream. Columbo: Peter Falk. Lang: Vincent Price. Lessing: Martin Sheen. Secretary: Sian Barbara Allen.

Season 3, Episode 2
October 7, 1973
Any Old Port in a Storm
A wine maker murders his brother, who is threatening to sell the family vineyard. Carsini: Donald Pleasence. Columbo: Peter Falk. Karen: Julie Harris. Ric: Gary Conway. Joan: Joyce Jillson.

Season 3, Episode 3
November 4, 1973
Candidate for Crime
A senatorial candidate murders his campaign manager, passing it off as an attempt on his own life. Hayward: Jackie Cooper. Columbo: Peter Falk. Victoria: Joanne Linville. Linda: Tisha Sterling. Stone: Harry Swofford.

Season 3, Episode 4
December 16, 1973
Double Exposure
A research specialist uses subconscious stimuli to lure a victim to his death. Dr. Kepple: Robert Culp. Columbo: Peter Falk. White: Chuck McCann. Mrs. Norris: Louise Latham. Norris: Robert Middleton. Tanya: Arlene Martel.

Season 3, Episode 5
January 18, 1974
Publish or Perish
Faced with the defection of his most valuable author, a publisher murders the writer to collect a huge insurance benefit. Greenleaf: Jack Cassidy. Kane: John Chandler. Columbo: Peter Falk. Eileen: Mariette Hartley. Mallory: Mickey Spillane.

Season 3, Episode 6
February 10, 1974
Mind Over Mayhem
A scientist has a son who plagiarized a discovery, and a colleague who threatens to reveal the fact. The solution: murder the would-be informer. Cahill: Jose Ferrer. Columbo: Peter Falk. Margaret Nicholson: Jessica Walter. Neill Cahill: Robert Walker. Steve: Lee H. Montgomery.

Season 3, Episode 7
March 3, 1974
Swan Song
A singer murders his wife, an evangelist who exploits his talents to raise money for religious crusades. Tommy: Johnny Cash. Columbo: Peter Falk. Edna: Ida Lupino. Maryann: Bonnie Van Dyke. Luke: William McKinney.

Season 3, Episode 8
May 5, 1974
A Friend in Deed
A police commissioner murders his wife and pins the crime on a burglar. Columbo: Peter Falk. Halperin: Richard Kiley. Jessup: Val Avery. Dreyer: John Finnegan. Caldwell: Michael McGuire.




Season 4, Episode 1
September 15, 1974
An Exercise in Fatality
A fitness expert murders a business associate. Milo Janus: Robert Conrad. Columbo: Peter Falk. Ruth Stafford: Collin Wilcox. Jessica: Gretchen Corbett. Buddy: Pat Harrington.

Season 4, Episode 2
October 6, 1974
Negative Reaction
Dick Van Dyke portrays a photographer who murders his wife and pins the crime on an ex-convict. Columbo: Peter Falk. Alvin Deschler: Don Gordon. Lorna McGrath: Joanna Cameron. Serge San Martin: David Sheiner.

Season 4, Episode 3
October 27, 1974
By Dawn's Early Light
The director of a military academy murders the man who threatens to turn the school into a coed college. Rumford: Patrick McGoohan. Columbo: Peter Falk. Springer: Mark Wheeler.

Season 4, Episode 4
February 9, 1975
Troubled Waters
On a cruise, Columbo probes the murder of the singer who performed with the ship's band. Filmed aboard an actual cruise. Danzinger: Robert Vaughn. Harrington: Dean Stockwell.

Season 4, Episode 5
March 2, 1975
Playback
An electronics expert murders his mother-in-law and invents an ingenious scheme to cover his tracks. Van Wyck: Oskar Werner. Elizabeth: Gena Rowlands. Columbo: Peter Falk. Margaret: Martha Scott.

Season 4, Episode 6
April 27, 1975
A Deadly State of Mind
A psychiatrist has an affair with a patient and then kills her husband. Columbo: Peter Falk. Collier: George Hamilton. Nadia: Lesley Warren. Karl Donner: Stephen Elliott. Kramer: Bruce Kirby. Anita Borden: Karen Machon
